title: Tzatziki With Beets And Mint
summary: Tzatziki With Beets And Mint is a gluten free, primal, and vegetarian hor d'oeuvre. One serving contains 226 calories, 14g of protein, and 15g of fat. For $1.47 per serving, this recipe covers 9% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 4. 1 person were glad they tried this recipe. A mixture of garlic, extra virgin olive oil, greek yogurt, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so flavorful. This recipe is typical of Mediterranean cuisine. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 35%. This score is rather bad. Similar recipes include Avocado-Mint Tzatziki, Lamb Pitas With Cucumber Mint Tzatziki, and Feeding Friends: Fennel Tzatziki with Mint.
